custom-action.name: unsubscribe
custom-action.description:
Unsubscribe from a topic on an MQTT broker.
Possible parameters are: - BrokerAlias (optional): Alias identifying the broker handling the topic to unsubscribe from.Assumes and requires that, for the current User Path, a connection has been established and associated to the specified BrokerAlias. If User Path connects to one broker only, this parameter can be left out. - Topic (required): The topic to subscribe from.
